name: Dynastes
description:
Play it on fullscreen!!

Dynastes is a platformer where you play as a hercules beetle that uses his broken horn as a weapon to fight a horde of mutant microbes that threaten your home.

Your main objective is to defeat all enemies at once using your time slow ability. You MUST defeat them all during the slow using your normal slash or slash attack, or else, they will quickly regenerate and respawn again infinitely. 

This game was made in one week for a game dev challenge at University Feevale where I study. 

Credits:

Felipe Dermann (Me): Programming, level design

Felipe Schmidt: Background and tiles art

Cauê Cortes: Character art and animations

Leonardo Gomez: Logo and UI art

Sound and music is all royalty free taken from the web.

Feedback is always welcome.

Thank you for playing!
